thread.section_title: Amigo Loans Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of amigoloans.co.uk
thread.title: Manu

author: Manu
title: Manu
text: Amigo was very considerate and understanding in giving a loan to a person with a limited credit history in the UK. Although I am in a well paying job, the fact that I moved recently to the UK makes people like me with a limited credit history look totally untouchable for high street banks. Amigo opened a door and some breathing space for me, whose only other option would be pay day loans. Thank you very much Amigo !
